scripts.build: npm run prebuild && prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && next build

comments.prebuild: Pre-build validation - checks DATABASE_URL and database connectivity. Prints diagnostics visible in Vercel logs.
comments.build: Production build - REQUIRES valid DATABASE_URL (PostgreSQL). Runs prebuild check, then migrations. Used by Vercel.
comments.build:local: Local development build - Does NOT require database. Use this for local builds when Postgres is not available.
comments.postinstall: Auto-generates Prisma client after npm install. Runs on both local and Vercel.
